item.description:
Want to try Kayaking ? Have a kayak and want others to go with ? Then join me and some friends in Hooksett at Edgewater Kayak. They rent for only $5/ hr. There are single and double boats. Everyone gets a paddle and vest. There is plenty of parking for renters. If your bringing your own boat, Rob will ask a donation of $5.00. It helps pay for the Porto potty ( aren't we glad he has that now ! )
We will head up the Merrimack to the park and stop for lunch and a stretch. We can continue up river more to a nice warm cove for swimming for those who wish that. So bring your lunch, water, swimming suits and smiles.
You may call Rob to reserve your boat at 540-6520. leave a message if nobody answers. See you then.
Any questions..call Cindy 603-315-0275
item.name: Come try Kayaking
